chapter.title: Building mod_cluster's Java components from source
chapter.para: Building from source the components used in JBoss AS/JBossWeb/Tomcat requires Maven 2.0.x.
Note: Some maven tests are using UDP port 23365 make sure you are local firewall allows the port.

sect1.title: Build products
sect1.para: The build produces the following output in the target directory:

listitem.para: Exploded format sar to copy to the deploy dir in your JBoss AS install
Jar files to copy to the lib directory in your JBossWeb or Tomcat install to support use of mod_cluster
The full distribution tarball; includes the above elements
